xlsrch
======

tools for development..... in anad labo

Installation
------------

::

    pip install xlsrch

Usage
-----

::

    python -m xlsrch
    ... edit config file: xlsrch_conf.yaml
    ... invoke again
    python -m xlsrch
    ... the result will print out on STD-OUT and out.txt on default

not yet edit
